## BatchedCallback type

The callback function signature for the `eachEvent` which is available when `batch` is true.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type BatchedCallback = (action: BatchedKeyboardAction, index: number, actions: BatchedKeyboardAction[]) => void;
```
